Last week at NextFin Summit during @token2049, co-hosted by @ethereum_sg and @ethereumfndn, our Product Lead - @joshuacheong, took the stage to discuss Ethereumâ€™s Financial Market Infrastructure.

Ethereum and Mantle Network are making institutional crypto adoption simpler by:

â€¢ Plugging into DeFi â€“ stablecoins and tokenized assets connect seamlessly with major platforms.

â€¢ Standardized tokens â€“ payments and yield become transparent and reliable.

â€¢ Strong liquidity â€“ ample assets from the start, with professional-grade tools.

Backed by @ethereum's trust and powered by Mantleâ€™s fast, low-cost tech, using stablecoins and tokenized assets day-to-day is now practical, scalable, and efficient.

tweets.author: Mantle_Official

tweets.content:
Fantastic points. Two addendums:

1) MNT is fully circulating, there is no inflation schedule or unlocks coming where VCs dump on you. Half is sitting in treasuries and Bybit who are long term holders. Bybit is already very successful in its own right, so building @Mantle_Official into the next gen tokenization platform for RWA is a personal goal, not about money.

2) Unlike some recent run ups like XPL or ASTER where early folks got in cheap and got rich too quickly (10-20x+), MNT was sitting at $1 and has only ~2.5xâ€™d since then. Thereâ€™s no large selling pressure looking to quickly exit hence the strong performance while rest of market has been down. 

The asymmetric catchup trade is still early and patient capital is waiting. The number of folks on CT talking about $MNT is still low. Just imagine where price action goes when the trade becomes consensus on your TL.
